title: 为什么HMCL扫描不到java
author: x5x52
txt_content:
我的电脑已经安装了java，可是HMCL扫描不到java，而且打不开

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content: 卸载之前安装的所有 java ，安装这个 https://download.mcbbs.net/java/jre_x64.exe

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
卸载所有安装的java
安装这个
https://download.mcbbs.net/java/jre_x64.exe

不要修改安装路径

replies.author: 小张up
replies.txt_content:
重新安装java，不要改路径
然后重启电脑

replies.author: qq107289387
replies.txt_content: 是不是没有配置环境变量？ 试试在cmd里面用 java -version
